item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks Marek! I'm glad that my ideas for change are not completely crazy. Haha.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Marek! I’m glad that my ideas for change are not completely crazy. Haha.

item.title: By: Marek Jasovsky
item.dc:creator: Marek Jasovsky
item.description: wow, looking forward to new changes ;) and I have to admit I started to like Thursday's posts and their format so if you can incorporate this into more reviews, the better. so not only those one-point lessons (pls do not abandon them), also structured review in form of opening, midgame, endgame, strategy, flow of game... etc are very good points for orientation regarding particular game. keeeeep the great work going ;)
